padExampleSrcHtml:
<h3>Actions</h3>

&open;table&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;list '5;10;15;20',  name='one'&close;&open;/demo&close;
&open;demo&close;&open;list '15;20;25;30', name='two'&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one&close;
  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;two&close;
  &open;$two&close;
&open;/two&close;&open;/demo&close;

  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one combine='two'&close;
  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one merge='two'&close;
  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one difference='two'&close;
  &open;$one&close;
&open;/one&close;&open;/demo&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one intersection='two'&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one onlyMe='two'&close;

&open;demo&close;&open;one onlyOther='two'&close;

&open;/table&close;
